text:
A Texas Army veteran and Purple Heart recipient is enjoying a present too big to fit under a tree.

On Sunday, former combat medic Travis Worrell hoisted the flag in front of his Christmas gift - a mortgage-free smart home: https://www.easttexasmatters.com/news/local-news/texas-army-veteran-gets-a-smart-home-for-christmas/1674061960

RT what I wrote last week about multiple implications of U.S. pullout from #Syria. 

#Israel must now step up attacks inside Syria. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/israeli-strikes-hit-arms-depot-in-damascus-syria-says/2018/12/26/87066c86-08e6-11e9-a3f0-71c95106d96a_story.html?utm_term=.700f00b061be

Chances of a broader & dangerous conflict with Hezbollah & Iran have increased substantially. https://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/1075514003181449223 QT @marcorubio Netanyahu said of Syria retreat “we will make sure Israel's security is preserved & we will defend ourselves from this arena." 

Translation: #Israel will now have to step up attacks inside #Syria even if it results in a new war with Hezbollah & potentially #Iran.
The six largest banks now have over $10 trillion in assets—54% of GDP. We must break up these huge financial institutions. If a bank is too big to fail, it is too big to exist.

Lila Johnson has worked in the State Department for two decades, sweeping floors and scrubbing bathrooms. Due to the government shutdown, she’s worried about whether or not she’ll be able to pay her rent or make car payments. The President needs to end this government shutdown. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1076295535093518336 QT @washingtonpost As Trump battles Congress, federal workers are caught in the middle https://trib.al/IF5mFWk

There will no real social progress in this country unless we have the courage to take on Wall Street, the insurance companies, the drug companies, the military-industrial complex, the fossil fuel industry, the prison industry and all the other forces of greed.
The failure to reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act — and instead, let it expire with the government shutdown — is absolutely shameful.

Felipe Alonzo-Gomez was just 8 years old when he died on Christmas Eve while in CBP custody. CBP must provide answers about how this happened, and create stronger protections for people in its custody. The loss of even one child is too great – these tragedies cannot continue. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1077904381318594560 QT @nytimes The death of an 8-year-old boy from Guatemala comes just weeks after a 7-year-old girl from the same country also died in U.S. Border Patrol custody https://trib.al/oZylCp0

We must rebuild the American labor movement and make it easier, not harder, for workers to join unions. We must recommit ourselves to bringing all working people together in the fight for a just and humane world.

When the United States is one of thirteen countries in the world where the rates of pregnancy-related illness and death are worse than they were 25 years ago, we know we have work to do. We must keep standing up for women’s health care and pass the Maternal CARE Act.

This is grotesque and unconscionable. Felipe’s and Jakelin’s deaths must be investigated immediately. https://twitter.com/ap/status/1077630553145397251 QT @AP BREAKING: U.S. immigration authorities say an 8-year-old boy from Guatemala has died in government custody. It's the second instance this month of an immigrant child dying while being detained. https://apnews.com/0a7e7ec16cd743e4840c321a99e005ef?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=AP&utm_campaign=SocialFlow

RT @postandcourier U.S. Senator @BernieSanders has a message for @Boeing:

Quit harassing and firing your North Charleston workers.

https://www.postandcourier.com/business/bernie-sanders-calls-on-boeing-to-stop-harassing-firing-north/article_16abbcf0-03a2-11e9-a6ab-ef064f00982d.html

RT @postandcourier "It is no coincidence that all of the workers who were recently fired openly support the union."

U.S. Senator @BernieSanders is standing up to @Boeing. 

https://www.postandcourier.com/business/bernie-sanders-calls-on-boeing-to-stop-harassing-firing-north/article_16abbcf0-03a2-11e9-a6ab-ef064f00982d.html

In 1980, CEOs made 30 times more than the average worker. Last year, the CEO-to-worker compensation ratio was 312-to-1. Together, we must finally create an America that works for all of us, not just those on top.

RT @LtGovOliver Fifty years ago, the Federal Fair Housing Act made it illegal to discriminate based on race, sex, religion, familial status, disability status, or national origin.

Today, our Administration remains committed to fair housing standards across New Jersey.  https://nj.gov/governor/news/news/562018/approved/20181226a.shtml http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvXDOLmWoAI_Ftp.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvXDSBzWwAAH7wA.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvXDTpmXQAEdINt.jpg

The Senate voted unanimously on a compromise to keep the government open. @realDonaldTrump chose to reject it and go into another #TrumpShutdown.  

The American people deserve better. They deserve a government that works for them.

Another immigrant child in detention has died and just last week Secretary Nielsen said she couldn’t provide a specific number of how many people have died while in government custody. Just another reason why Nielsen must resign.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Du6X_7HU8AElVhF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1075867076106031106/pu/vid/320x320/fbvSY_kRZ1Wr-zeH.mp4?tag=6

As you head back home for the holidays this week, remember that until the government reopens, approximately 53,000 TSA agents are not being paid to be at work right now during one of the busiest travel times of the year. Please be sure to be patient during this time.

RT @TeamPelosi It is an honor to have your support, Congressman Lewis. With so much at stake, now is the time to come together and work #ForThePeople. —NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DutkJw7X4AEHpzl.jpg

We must never forget that all the rights and gains we have, they’re never given to us as acts of charity and generosity by the rich and powerful. They are won by the struggle and sacrifice of people from below.

RT @NicholsUprising What made ⁦@BernieSanders⁩ so valuable—and effective—in 2018 was the senator’s determination not just to resist Trump but to promote an alternative politics that challenges corporate power.  https://www.thenation.com/article/2018-progressive-honor-roll/

Mathematician Dr. Gladys West was born to a farming family in a community of sharecroppers. At a young age, she realized that education could get her out of the fields. She was inducted into the Air Force Hall of Fame for her contributions to the GPS. 
https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1075934898198900736 QT @thehill Gladys West, the "hidden figure" behind invention of GPS, inducted into Air Force hall of fame https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/422353-dr-gladys-west-the-hidden-figure-of-gps-inducted-into-air-force http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Du59FlfWwAA8lD6.jpg

Erin is one of the thousands of federal workers that was furloughed. "I need my paycheck. We all have mortgages and bills we have to pay. We're already struggling."

Just because Trump shut down the government doesn’t mean the bills go away. #ShutdownStories https://twitter.com/CBSNews/status/1077740783376261121 QT @CBSNews "We do live paycheck by paycheck": Federal workers struggle as shutdown continues https://www.cbsnews.com/news/federal-workers-struggle-as-shutdown-continues-through-christmas-2018-12-25/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab7e&linkId=61557407 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvTnh_IWoAIOvdS.jpg
